name: 植物分子生物學特論
description: This course will cover the advanced principles of molecular plant science. Emphasis is placed on introduction of model plants, updated technologies to identify and study gene functions, and the regulation of gene expression.
goals: This course will cover the advanced principles of molecular plant science.
Emphasis is placed on introduction of model plants, updated technologies to identify and study gene functions, and the regulation of gene expression.
syllabus: Arabidopsis as a model system Long distance signaling Nitrate uptake and transport in plants Photobiochemistry Plant defense to pathogen Plant development Plant heat stress response Plant proteomics Plant response to heavy metals Plant tissue culture Polarity-Specific Expansion of Leaf Protein synthesis, sorting and degradation Sugar and phytohormone signal interactions Student oral presentations
